dublinCore.dc:title: 113 S1635 IS: Extend Not Cut SNAP Benefits Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Casey introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry

form.official-title: To amend the American Recovery and Reinvestment Act of 2009 to extend the period during which supplemental nutrition assistance program benefits are temporarily increased.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Extend Not Cut SNAP Benefits Act.

section.header: Extension of temporary increase in supplemental nutrition assistance benefits
section.text: Section 101(a) of title I of division A of the American Recovery and Reinvestment Act of 2009 (Public Law 111–5; 123 Stat. 120; 124 Stat. 3265) is amended—

paragraph.text: in paragraph (1), by striking section 3(o) and inserting section 3(u); and
in paragraph (2), by striking 2013 and inserting 2014.

section.text: The budgetary effects of this Act, for the purpose of complying with the Statutory Pay-As-You-Go Act of 2010, shall be determined by reference to the latest statement titled Budgetary Effects of PAYGO Legislation for this Act, submitted for printing in the Congressional Record by the Chairman of the Senate Budget Committee, provided that such statement has been submitted prior to the vote on passage.
This Act and the amendments made by this Act shall take effect on September 30, 2013.
